Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to affordable housing in cities having a population of one million or more
Summary: Establishes the affordability plus program in cities having a population of one million or more to provide loans and grants to increase the supply of housing accommodations for families and persons of low income; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 31 §§1280 - 1287, Priv Hous Fin L; amd §11.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law and the local finance law, in relation to affordable housing in cities having a population of one million or more
